Greg Hayes is going to be on Squawk Box sometime before 8:00 am. CEOs do not go on TV unless they have something good to say about their company. RTX up in pre-market over a dollar. Could this help RTX's run to 100?
EPS: $1.14Going to go over $5.50/sh for 202218 PE = $9920 PE = $110 (if street estimates growth going forward)

Raytheon is demanding U.S. employees declare their status as vaccinated, unvaccinated, or decline-to-state by Friday 15 October 2021. They say failure to declare will result in termination. BTW the deadline for being fully vaccinated (2 weeks after the final dose) is 1 January 2021. Raytheon is a leader in this, many other tech firms are doing a slower rollout. Rumor has it a surprisingly large number of employees have not declared or have marked decline-to-state. I wonder if Raytheon is bluffing, or will they fire people? Maybe they want to reduce the workforce? I can't imagine that this will be good for the stock price.
I think this stock is going to do well on upcoming earnings (October 26) and project robust business for the future. I would like to see 100 by year's end and I will take some profits in my 401.
